--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Darren Izzard" <zysyshelp@y...> wrote:
> 
> >>Has anyone use NEAT for facial recognition or to
> >>identify objects?
> >Darren Izzard (who is zysyshelp in this group) did work
> >that is relevant to this.  He had an "eye" move over a
> >shape to identify the shape.  I thought he had uploaded his
> >experiments.cpp file to the files section, but it doesn't seem to be
> >there now.
> 
> It is still there, in the Files section (shaperecog.zip, at the
bottom of
> the list), and it gave me very good results. I did explain in some
detail
> how the experiment worked in an earlier post: I'll fish it out if anyone
> wants to see it.
> 

Sorry Darren, I mistakenly thought the file was gone the first time I
looked there, but I was wrong.  I deleted my post since then, pointing
out the file is there after all!

ken
